channel.title: Disabling and Enabling Yell

item.title: Disabling and Enabling Yell
item.dc:creator: @bobbohobbo bobbohobbo
item.description:
@bobbohobbo wrote:

I want to disable ::yell and enable by:
::zyelloff
::zyellon

I made a thing for it but it only disables mine -.- how would i make t disable everyones Chat i have this:

  else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("zYellOff") && playerRights >= 1)
      {
         if(playerIsMember == 0) {
         Yelling = false;
      }
   sendMessage("Yelling is now off");

   }

And so on with the other one and in the ::yell command i added:

if (Yelling == false)
{
sendMessage(“Yelling is blocked ATM”);
}
else

But it only blocks mine how to block everyone elses?

Thanks.

Read full topic
